CC is a boundless world with block chain technology as its core
and dimensional human autonomy

Each dimension, in which human beings can creates their own home and their own two-dimensional image as a “ Small World”.

Dimension. Human beings establish relations with each other.

The block chain technology makes the generated dialogue private, safe and decentralized.

Each sentence is whispered, which makes a number of small worlds establish staggered and

form stable connections so that “ Small Size World” is created.

The creation of dimensional human beings in the small world and the interaction of the small thousand world have both contributed.

The global book of block chain de-centralization and anti-tampering enables everyone’s contribution to be open and transparent,

realizing equality that is not available in other worlds and being a “ Medium Size World”.

The small contributions of human beings in each dimension have accumulated to

jointly forge different parallel medium thousand worlds and finally jointly form a huge “ Boundless World” - CC Boundless world.

2000, we, the fifth generation of human beings are born.

The original traditional way of communication can’t express its own characteristics. We need a completely new social scene and expression way.

Therefore, CC is created, which is a free country of the fifth generation of human beings.

Dimension reduction starts and enters CC world

In CC world, we will reduce dimensions and expand into dimensional human beings,

and we can freely customize our unique two-dimensional image.

Skin color, facial features, face shape, hairstyle, figure and clothing can all be decided by ourselves ~ ~

Adjust your facial features
Adjust your figure
Make change

You can also create your own small world.

Every piece of grass, every tree, every stone, every house and etc. can be created separately.

Elements of the world or the small world can be placed in stores for purchase and use by other dimensional humans.

All creations will produce value, and all property rights of value will be protected.

Create elements of different styles
Create a small world
Shop

Ascending dimension expression and enjoying CC dimensional life

Becoming a dimensional human, you will no longer be limited to the one-dimensional expression of pictures, text, voice and video.

Your two-dimensional image will use high-dimensional expressions, actions and special effects to convey information to your friends.

The neural network keeps all information private, safe and decentralized.

Each sentence is whispered to protect the privacy of dimensional human beings.

Expression
Actions
Special effects

Create value and harvest cc neurons

NEURONS

are magic energy crystals distributed according to the contribution of dimensional human beings.

Both creating the world and chatting and exchanging can make contributions. The more contributions, the more gains.

However, the total number of neurons that CC world can produce is limited, with a total of 3 billion neuron crystals produced to keep the world running.

Every 30 minutes is a settlement cycle. In the first year, 41,097 neurons are distributed in each cycle, with a total of 1,972,676 distributed per day.

The annual output will decrease by 40 % from now on until the mining is completed 20 years later.

Various activities of dimensional human beings in CC world will affect the contribution weights. The formula of the contribution weight is:

Vitality*Activeness

Vitality is a comprehensive score of dimensional human’s historical activity, which only increases and does not decrease.

Activeness is a comprehensive evaluation of all activities of dimensional human beings during the period of time.

The more frequent the activities are, the higher the activeness will be.

The activeness will decay with the extension of time after the activity is stopped, which will drop to 0 after 24 hours.

To ensure the property rights of creators and the core and initial heart of CC world

is a global book that records the contributions made by dimensional human beings in CC world,

which ensures the uniqueness of the neurons that contribute to the output and the property rights

that cannot be tampered with, even if it is a donation.

Each neurite on the neural network will calculate, verify and hold these recorded information mutually,

which makes each piece of output information traceable and cannot be tampered with or forged.
